section.heading: Scope.
section.text: These regulations apply whenever an administrative law judge intends to impose a financial penalty.

section.heading: Requirements.
section.text: In determining the amount of financial penalty to be imposed, an administrative law judge shall consider the following:

para.text: The good faith of the violator;
The harmful effect of the violation on the public or the harmful effect of the violator's actions on the investigatory process of the Commission on Human Relations; and
